name: phpbb forums Tango
description:
phpbb forums Tango

	by Enrique Ulloa (ekz)
	http://ekz4.blogspot.com/

	Change all phpbb-2 forums to Tango style

	-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	Instructions:

	*Set your forum(s) in the domain field,  i.e : domain("forums.gentoo.org")
	*Set your date syntax to " d M y, G:i  "

	Optional:

	* Install Snap Links Firefox add-on   ( http://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/4336 )

	Bigger Preview:

	http://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/6239_after.png

	-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	Version 2.0
	*Fixes 'no-images' bug, (reported by Cereza)

	Version 1.9
	*added reply-locked pixmap
	*added icon_search pixmap
	*some alternative names added

	Version 1.8
	*corrected path to some images

	Version 1.6
	*new post, new topic and new pm pixmaps added.	
	*folder_locked_big pixmap added.

	Version 1.3
	*icon_reported_post missed pixmap added
